title: My Long-Distance Girlfriend Is Not Who I Thought She Was
description:
Today’s show is about a wife whose family won’t even be in the same room as her conservative husband, a man who just discovered his girlfriend is a compulsive liar, and the right way to set New Year’s resolutions.
  My family hates my husband because he is conservative
 I found out my long-distance girlfriend is not who I thought she was
 How to make new years resolutions
 mail your New Years resolutions to us:
 The Dr. John Delony Show | 1011 Reams Fleming Blvd. Franklin, TN 37064
  Let us know what’s going on by leaving a voicemail at 844.693.3291 or visiting johndelony.com/show.
 Support Our Sponsors:
  BetterHelp
 DreamCloud
 Churchill Mortgage
  Resources:
  Questions for Humans Conversation Cards
